name: dialup-deploy
description: A simple way to deploy websites with automatic SSL and subdomains

scripts.build:all: cleanup && bun run build:core && bun run build:actions && bun run build:server && bun run build:cli
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf packages/server/dist && rm -rf packages/core/dist && rm -rf packages/cli/dist && rm -rf packages/actions/dist
scripts.setup:local: bun run build:all && ROOT_DIR=$(pwd)/sites bun run --cwd packages/cli setup local
scripts.setup:production: bun run build:all && ROOT_DIR=$(pwd)/sites bun run --cwd packages/cli setup production
scripts.setup: bun run build:all && ROOT_DIR=$(pwd)/sites bun run --cwd packages/cli setup local
